inclusion.criterion: Living in institutional or non-institutional settings
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: 6 months post spinal cord injury (SCI) prior to entry or have Spina Bifida
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Selected in-patients involved in the Rehab I program
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Catheter dependent, having either an indwelling urinary catheter or using an external catheter, intermittent catheterization, or vesical urinary diversion (original bladder, whole or in part, serves as the collection receptacle for urine) for bladder management.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Two or more urinary tract infections (UTI) within the 12 months prior to the study.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Capable of understanding the purpose of the study and providing informed consent to participate
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Pursue appropriate follow-up over the course of the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Kidney stone(s) greater than 1 cm in size
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any obstructing kidney stone regardless of size
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Supravesical diversion (original bladder is no longer part of the collection receptacle for urine)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and multiple prior admissions for UTIs. They have been treated for urosepsis and have a non-obstructing stone in the L ureter.
